about_the_game:
While Full Gear's music was never supposed to be very elaborate, I think there's enough good songs in there to warrant a small soundtrack release. Especially if you like listening to some harder-to-find songs, this one's for you!

Most areas have three songs. For example, the Forge has:
  • The Flames Rest (Ambient): this plays when there are no enemies nearby.
  • The Flames Are Rising (Combat): this starts playing when enemies activate.
  • Fire Roar (Boss): This plays during the Forge boss battle.
The exception is the Kernel, which has no boss, and the Terminal, which has two boss tracks.

More music might be added later, so this soundtrack isn't definitive. Still, it contains all the current (full) tracks in Full Gear, allowing you to listen to the sounds of bells, cogwheels, and maybe the occasional normal instrument.

See you around!

name: Full Gear Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack for the steampunk traditional roguelike Full Gear. Ambient, combat and boss music - plus credits, tutorial, and title screen.
